docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, June 6 -- An alarming picture of Nazi infiltration in Argentina was painted in the Chamber of Deputies today by a Deputy of the Radical party, Manubens Calvet, who delivered a long speech in support of a motion presented by...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, June 6 -- An alarming picture of Nazi infiltration in Argentina was painted in the Chamber of Deputies today by a Deputy of the Radical party, Manubens Calvet, who delivered a long speech in support of a motion presented by himself to invite the Minister of Interior to inform Congress of steps taken to combat "pernicious foreign influences."
docs.abstract: Argentine Deputy M Calvet presents motion for Cong information on steps taken to combat pernicious foreign influences; s on Nazi plots in Argentina

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 7 (UP) -- President Alfredo Baldomir, observing cryptically that "the coasts of South America are exposed to aggression that is closer at hand than that from Europe," said tonight that Uruguay was prepared to offer base...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 7 (UP) -- President Alfredo Baldomir, observing cryptically that "the coasts of South America are exposed to aggression that is closer at hand than that from Europe," said tonight that Uruguay was prepared to offer base facilities for the defense of the Western Hemisphere.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES WEEK ENDED JUNE 7, 1941

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, June 2 -- In several high quarters here the suggestion was made today that another Pan-American Conference should be called soon to deal with the changed situation arising from President Roosevelt's "unlimited emergency"...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, June 2 -- In several high quarters here the suggestion was made today that another Pan-American Conference should be called soon to deal with the changed situation arising from President Roosevelt's "unlimited emergency" speech, which some thought altered considerably the basis of hemispheric cooperation that existed last Summer when the last conference met at Havana.

docs.snippet: LONDON, June 13 (AP) -- The Air Ministry reported tonight that the smoke had been so thick at the scene of the torpedoing of the German pocket battleship that the crews of succeeding planes in the attack had been unable to observe the results of...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, June 13 (AP) -- The Air Ministry reported tonight that the smoke had been so thick at the scene of the torpedoing of the German pocket battleship that the crews of succeeding planes in the attack had been unable to observe the results of their own work accurately.
